column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Don't go there as much as I use to
column2: but I love the Thorn Rooms.  I fist saw them when I was ten and have never gotten tired of looking at them
column3: just seeing all that intricate construction. Another favorite is the marble room where all the figures seem so life like.  There is also the armor and the Asian section that I try not to miss when I go.  It's fun to go in the summer because you can rest by eating in the Garden set in the middle of the museum.
